summary: A killer uses an 18th century machine with supernatural powers to terrorize students at a college.
cast: Travis Fimmel|Ben Mendelsohn|Michael Dorman|Nathaniel Buzolic|Jane Badler|Jessica Marais|John Jarratt|Murray Bartlett|Tahyna MacManus|Trilby Glover|Khan Chittenden|Malcolm Kennard|Rebecca Chalon|Chanel Marriott|Luke Carroll|Daniel Tenni|Gary Clementson|Tahlia Norrish|Michael Loney|James Hagan|Tristan Winter|Zaydah-lee|Quintin George|Aisling Rose McGrogan|Daniela Knopf|Ashley Gilbert|Jade Chamberlain|Phillip John Hastings|Chloe-Allyn Gallacher|Rhian Kate Glossop|Alyson Walker
title: Needle
